_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate legal pages (Privacy, Cookies, Terms). MUST be reviewed by legal professional.
_meta.note: Legal text must be compliant with jurisdiction (GDPR, CCPA, etc.). Always include disclaimer that this is template. Include {companyName} placeholders.

meta.title: Page title for SEO. Ex: 'Privacy Policy', 'Privacy - {companyName}'
meta.description: Meta description for SEO. ~150 chars. Ex: 'Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information'

privacy.title: Page heading. Standard. Ex: 'Privacy Policy', 'Data Privacy'
privacy.lastUpdated: Label for last update date. Ex: 'Last updated', 'Effective date'

warning._note: Development warning - remove in production after legal review
warning.title: Warning heading. Ex: 'Development Template - Not Legal', 'Template Notice'
warning.message: Warning message. Ex: 'This is a template for development only. Customize with your actual business details and review with a legal professional before launch.'

sections._note: Each section should be clear, transparent, and GDPR-compliant. Explain in plain language what data you collect, why, and how it's protected.

intro.title: Ex: 'Introduction', 'Overview', 'Our Commitment'
intro.content: Set the tone. Reassure users. Include {companyName} placeholder. Ex: 'At {companyName}, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.'

dataCollection.title: Ex: 'Information We Collect', 'Data Collection', 'What We Collect'
dataCollection.intro: Ex: 'We collect the following types of personal information:'
dataCollection.items: List of data types collected. Be specific about what and why. Ex: 'Email address and name for account creation', 'Payment information via Stripe', 'Usage data and analytics'

dataUsage.title: Ex: 'How We Use Your Information', 'Data Usage', 'Purpose of Processing'
dataUsage.intro: Ex: 'We use your personal data to:'
dataUsage.items: List of uses. Map to legal bases (contract, legitimate interest). Ex: 'Provide and maintain our services', 'Send service updates', 'Comply with legal obligations'

dataSharing.title: Ex: 'Data Sharing and Third Parties', 'Who We Share With', 'Third-Party Services'
dataSharing.intro: Ex: 'We share your data only with trusted service providers:'
dataSharing.items: List third parties and their compliance. Ex: 'Stripe (PCI-DSS compliant) for payments', 'Supabase (SOC 2 certified) for database'

yourRights.title: Ex: 'Your Rights (GDPR)', 'Your Data Rights', 'Privacy Rights'
yourRights.intro: Ex: 'Under GDPR, you have the following rights:'
yourRights.rights: List GDPR rights clearly. Ex: 'Right to access your data', 'Right to deletion', 'Right to data portability'
yourRights.contact: How to exercise rights. Ex: 'To exercise these rights, contact us at:', 'Email us to request...'

dataSecurity.title: Ex: 'Data Security', 'How We Protect Your Data', 'Security Measures'
dataSecurity.content: Explain security measures. Be honest about limitations. Ex: 'We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption and secure servers. However, no method is 100% secure.'

cookies.title: Ex: 'Cookies and Tracking', 'Cookie Use', 'Tracking Technologies'
cookies.content: Explain cookie use. Link to cookie policy if separate. Ex: 'We use essential cookies for auth and optional analytics cookies. Manage preferences via our consent banner.'

changes.title: Ex: 'Changes to This Policy', 'Policy Updates', 'Modifications'
changes.content: How you'll notify of changes. Ex: 'We may update this policy occasionally. We'll notify you by posting the new policy and updating the date.'

contact.title: Ex: 'Contact Us', 'Get in Touch', 'Questions?'
contact.content: How to contact for privacy questions. Include email/address placeholders. Ex: 'For questions about this policy, contact us:'
contact.updatePrompt: Reminder for production. Ex: '⚠️ Update with actual legal contact before launch'

meta.title: Ex: 'Cookie Policy', 'Cookies - {companyName}'
meta.description: Ex: 'Learn about how we use cookies and tracking technologies'

warning.title: Ex: 'Development Template - Configure Iubenda'
warning.message: Ex: 'For production, configure Iubenda to auto-generate compliant Cookie Policy.'

intro.title: Ex: 'What Are Cookies', 'Cookie Overview'
intro.content: Explain cookies simply. Include {companyName}. Ex: '{companyName} uses cookies to improve experience, analyze usage, and for marketing. This policy explains what cookies are and how to control them.'

necessary.title: Ex: 'Necessary Cookies', 'Essential Cookies'
necessary.description: Explain they're required. Ex: 'Essential for the site to function. Cannot be disabled.'
necessary.items: List of necessary cookies. Ex: 'Session cookies for auth', 'User preferences (language, theme)'

analytics.title: Ex: 'Analytics Cookies (Optional)', 'Performance Cookies'
analytics.description: Ex: 'Help us understand site usage. Data used to improve service.'
analytics.items: List analytics cookies. Ex: 'Page visit tracking', 'Performance monitoring'

marketing.title: Ex: 'Marketing Cookies (Optional)', 'Advertising Cookies'
marketing.description: Ex: 'Used to show relevant ads and measure campaigns. Opt out anytime.'
marketing.items: List marketing cookies and platforms. Ex: 'Google Ads for conversion tracking', 'Meta Pixel for Facebook ads'

manage.title: Ex: 'How to Manage Cookies', 'Control Your Cookies'
manage.content: How to manage. Ex: 'Control preferences via our consent banner. You can also block via browser settings.'

meta.title: Ex: 'Terms of Service', 'Terms & Conditions - {companyName}'
meta.description: Ex: 'Terms and conditions for using our service'

warning.title: Ex: 'Review with Legal Professional', 'Legal Review Required'
warning.message: Ex: 'These Terms have been generated with your data. Review with legal professional before launch.'

intro.title: Ex: 'Agreement to Terms', 'Acceptance'
intro.content: Standard acceptance clause. Include {companyName}. Ex: 'By using {companyName}, you agree to these Terms. If you disagree, do not use the service.'

accounts.title: Ex: 'Accounts', 'User Accounts', 'Registration'
accounts.content: Account responsibilities. Ex: 'You must provide accurate info. You're responsible for safeguarding your password and all account activity.'

service.title: Ex: 'Use of Service', 'Acceptable Use', 'User Conduct'
service.items: List prohibited uses. Ex: 'Use for illegal purposes', 'Interfere with system security', 'Abuse or harass others', 'Send spam'

payments.title: Ex: 'Payments and Billing', 'Subscription Terms', 'Billing'
payments.content: Payment terms. Be clear about refunds. Ex: 'Subscriptions billed in advance. Payments non-refundable except as required by law.'

termination.title: Ex: 'Termination', 'Account Termination', 'Suspension'
termination.content: Termination rights. Ex: 'We may terminate your account immediately for breach of Terms.'

liability.title: Ex: 'Limitation of Liability', 'Liability Limits', 'Disclaimers'
liability.content: Liability limitations. Include {companyName}. Ex: '{companyName} is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, including loss of profits or data.'

changes.title: Ex: 'Changes to Terms', 'Modifications', 'Updates'
changes.content: How terms may change. Ex: 'We may modify these Terms. Material changes require 30 days notice.'

contact.title: Ex: 'Contact Us', 'Questions?'
contact.content: Legal contact info. Ex: 'Questions about these Terms? Contact us:'
contact.updatePrompt: Ex: '⚠️ Update with actual legal contact before launch'
